titleStmt.title: A svvete and deuoute sermon of holy saynt Ciprian of mortalitie of man. The rules of a christian lyfe made by Picus erle of Mirandula, bothe translated into englyshe by syr Thomas Elyot knyghte
De mortalitate. English
titleStmt.author: Cyprian, Saint, Bishop of Carthage.

titleStmt.title: A svvete and deuoute sermon of holy saynt Ciprian of mortalitie of man. The rules of a christian lyfe made by Picus erle of Mirandula, bothe translated into englyshe by syr Thomas Elyot knyghte
De mortalitate. English
titleStmt.author: Cyprian, Saint, Bishop of Carthage.
Pico della Mirandola, Giovanni, 1463-1494, Regulae duodecim portim excitantes portim dirigentes hominem in pugna spirituali. aut
Elyot, Thomas, Sir, 1490?-1546.

notesStmt.note: Translation by Sir Thomas Elyot of: Saint Cyprian. De mortalitate.

Includes: The rules of a Christian lyfe made by Iohn Picus the elder erle of Mirandula (a translation of: Regulae duodecim portim excitantes portim dirigentes hominem in pugna spirituali). Caption title.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
